name: 307-group-1
description: **Project Idea:** For students who are looking for off-campus housing, **PropHunt** is a review site that allows users to post and view reviews about rental properties. Unlike other typical rental review apps, our product is geared towards the unique challenges faced by student-tenants, such as regular turnover, studying abroad, and campus proximity.

scripts.start: concurrently -n FRONTEND,BACKEND "npm run -w packages/react-frontend dev" "npm run -w packages/express-backend dev"
